title: Trafficking in death (1950) American crime film noir - directed by William A. Seiter

sources.title: Trafficking in death (1950) American crime film noir - directed by William A. Seiter
sources.description:
Dive into the shadowy world of international intrigue with BORDERLINE â€“ a razor-sharp film-noir gem.

ðŸ”¥ SYNOPSIS
Fearless undercover agent Madeleine Haley (Claire Trevor) as she infiltrates a high-stakes smuggling ring along the U.S.-Mexico border. Posing as the wife of smooth-talking courier Johnny McClean (Fred MacMurray), she must outwit ruthless kingpin Pete Ritchie (Raymond Burr) in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse. Expect twists, seduction, and white-knuckle suspense!

Directed by William A. Seiter (Sons of the Desert)

B&W version https://youtu.be/UOWfQucrBsk

Claire Trevor (Key Largo) as Madeleine Haley
Fred MacMurray (Double Indemnity) as Johnny McClean
Raymond Burr (Rear Window) as Pete Ritchie

Stylish Noir Atmosphere: Moody lighting, sharp dialogue & tense desert chases!
Unlikely Alliances: Romance and deception collide in the borderlands.
Classic Suspense: A masterclass in 1950s thriller filmmaking.
